snippet: The choreographer Sarah Skaggs takes a contemplative approach in “The New Ecstatic,” which was presented Thursday through Saturday at Danspace.
abstract: Gia Kourlas reviews premiere of Sarah Skaggs dance The New Ecstatic at Danspace Project.
lead_paragraph: The choreographer Sarah Skaggs takes a contemplative approach in “The New Ecstatic,” which was presented Thursday through Saturday at Danspace.

headline.seo: Sarah Skaggs Presents ‘The New Ecstatic’ at Danspace
headline.main: A Transcendence Grounded in Austere Contemplation
headline.print_headline: A Transcendence Grounded In Austere Contemplation
